(NO RAGGING ON OTHER PEOPLE'S ANSWERS)

So.... What is the purpose of life?

If you have no answer to that, then

What is your purpose in life?

I can answer from my point of view:

Purpose of life: to spread itself and make it's environment more comfortable for life.

My purpose in life:

To observe the end of time, and all the events leading to that point, either by living that long or having my children and their children and so forth live that long.
that question has been definitively answered, and the answer is 42. Of course what the actual question is remains to be seen
The purpose of life is to live. When you die you completed the purpose
